thread.title: Prep Football Preview: Polo, Milledgeville on collision course for big showdown
thread.title_full: Prep Football Preview: Polo, Milledgeville on collision course for big showdown

author: Jay Taft
title: Prep Football Preview: Polo, Milledgeville on collision course for big showdown
text: Season record: Polo 5-0, Milledgeville 4-1 Last week : Polo 50, Warren 6; Milledgeville 35, River Ridge 0 Last meeting : Polo 52, Milledgeville 27 Fast facts : Both teams are off to their best starts in at least seven years. … Polo has scored 254 points this year and has allowed just 14. … The Marcos have 11 defenders with 20 or more tackles this year, led by Dylan Beers (38 tackles) and DB Tristen Aguilar. … Milledgeville is led by Jeremy Bibler (360 yards and three TDs on 32 carries), but the Missiles have five touchdowns on special teams, and three more that have been called back on penalties. … Polo is averaging 8.5 yards per carry on the ground, led by Brooks (434 yards on 42 carries and five touchdowns) and Brody Grobe (15-184 with 4 TDs), as well as Brad Cavanaugh (30-293 with 7 TDs) and Jesse Ditzler (15-146 with 2 TDs). … Polo has not had to throw the ball much this season, but both QBs Brody Grobe (10-for-13 for 146 yards) and Wyatt Patterson (12-for-18 for 201 yards) have a pair of TD passes and no interceptions. Page 2 of 2 - River Ridge at Freeport Aquin When: 7 p.m. Season record : River Ridge 0-5, Aquin 3-2 Last week : Milledgeville 35, River Ridge 0; Aquin 55, Orangevill 6 Last meeting : Aquin 41, River Ridge 20 Fast facts : Aquin QB Jonah Diemer has completed 16-for-39 passes for 177 yards and four touchdowns. .. Aquin needds to win at least two of its last three games to be playoff eligible and it has Polo (5-0) and Stockton (4-1) remaining after Friday. … River Ridge has been outscored 259-33 this season. …The Wildcats will continue their string of tough opponents, taking on a 3-2 team after their first five foes are currently a combined 21-4. Christian Life at Chicago Hope Academy When: 7 p.m. Season record : Christian Life 3-2, Hope Academy 5-0 Last week : Christian Life 35, Luther North 8 Last meeting : Christian Life 35, Hope 34 Fast facts : Hope went 8-1 last regular season, losing only to Christian Life in Week 2. … Hope has outscored its foes 241-60 while Christian Life has 133-76. … Adam Ambrogio has rushed for 478 yards and five TDs while passing for 226 yards and four TDs for Christian Life. … Christian Life, which had three shutouts and a forfeit win last season, does not have a shutout yet this year.
